title: 3D Printing with Windows 10
headline: Get a clear understanding of how 3D printing works with this free online course on 3D Printing with Windows 10.
description: This free online 3D printing course will teach you everything you need to know about 3D printing with Windows 10. You will study the 3D Manufacturing Format (3MF) which allows design applications to send full-fidelity 3D models to a mix of other applications, platforms, services, and printers, the different use cases for a 3D printer, the applications you can use to make, examine, and share 3D models, plus a whole lot more!
courseDescription:
The course begins by explaining the tools in Windows 10 that are useful in 3D printing and how the 3MF consortium has helped to improve file formats that will be used in 3D printing. You will learn about the 3D print bureaus and their abilities as well as the variety of materials that can be used in 3D printing. You will also learn about 3MF design considerations and what the future holds for 3D design.

You will then learn the difference between a 3MF file and an STL file, as well as the two classes of scenarios for adding 3D printing to any app. The course also shows you how the different features in a 3D builder operate. You will then learn how to load, view, and repair objects in a 3D builder so that they are ready to print. The course will then provide you with essential knowledge on what to do if an error message appears in your 3D printer.

3D printing is one of the most interesting technologies developed in recent years, and is particularly useful in the areas of engineering, design, and manufacturing. By taking this course, you will learn everything you need to know about this incredible technology and gain an edge over your peers and colleagues. So why wait? Check out the course today, and get started with your next learning journey!

Start Course Now
